definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: All right. Let's bury the hatchet and be friends.
sentences.chinese: 好了，让我们捐弃前嫌，成为朋友。

sentences.english: Let's wipe the slate clean and forget our past quarrels.
sentences.chinese: 让我们捐弃前嫌，忘却过去的争吵吧。

sentences.english: That pace has just gotten even slower, highlighting the difficulty the two countries continue to face in putting a nasty past behind them.
sentences.chinese: 进展如今甚至更加缓慢，凸显两国捐弃前嫌的困难。

sentences.english: The custom of abandoning house ever existed in the prehistoric period of China.
sentences.chinese: 在我国史前时期曾存在着捐弃房屋的风俗。

sentences.english: The Colbies and the Carlingtons sank their family feud for common interests.
sentences.chinese: 科尔比家族和卡林顿家族为了共同的利益捐弃旧怨。

sentences.english: These two used to be business opponents, but they have buried all their old grudges and are sitting together right now.
sentences.chinese: 这两个生意上曾经的对手，如今捐弃前嫌坐在了一起。

sentences.english: It is time to bury our past misunderstandings.
sentences.chinese: 是我们捐弃前嫌的时候了。

sentences.english: The nations leagued against their common enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须捐弃歧见，对付共同的敌人。

sentences.english: Let's bury the hatchet and be friends.
sentences.chinese: 好了，让我们捐弃前嫌，成为朋友。

sentences.english: The two boys agreed to let bygones be bygones and make friend again.
sentences.chinese: 两个孩子决定捐弃前嫌，重新做朋友。

sentences.english: It also allows us to forgive and forget, bury the hatchet, and roll with the punches.
sentences.chinese: 健忘让我们宽恕和遗忘，捐弃前嫌，大事化小。

definition: irrespective of/to have no concerns whatsoever about
to propose/to put forward (an idea)/to initiate
that being the case/then/in that case
to persist/to continue upholding/to persevere/to stick to sth/stubborn
change of string, move out of rut (idiom); dramatic change of direction/to dance to a different tune
